document.full_text: mr. cox was at the center of black radical politics as a member of the black panther party high command and earned a moment of celebrity in 1970.
document.title: d.l. cox, a leader of radicals during 1960s, dies at 74
lines_and_colors: mr. cox was at the center of black radical politics as a member of the black panther party high command and earned a moment of celebrity in 1970.
